freenet.node
Class NodeIPDetector

java.lang.Object
  freenet.node.NodeIPDetector

public class NodeIPDetector
extends Object

Detect the IP address of the node. Doesn't return port numbers, doesn't have access to per-port information (NodeCrypto - UdpSocketHandler etc).

processDetectedIPs

public void processDetectedIPs(DetectedIP[] list)
Process a list of DetectedIP's from the IP detector plugin manager. DetectedIP's can tell us what kind of NAT we are behind as well as our public IP address.
